jx.jx_cn_mean: 消除紧张；（聚会开始，人们初识时）打破僵局

in a precarious or risky situation

lj.lj_ls: 你现在处境很 危险。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English īs, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch ijs and German Eis

example.ex: Glaciers are moving rivers of ice...
example.tran: 冰河是犹如河水般流动的巨大冰体。

entry.def: If you ice a cake, you cover it with icing.

example.ex: I've iced and decorated the cake.
example.tran: 我在蛋糕上挂了糖衣，还做了花样装饰。

entry.def: An ice is an ice cream .

example.ex: He's eaten a lot of choc ices.
example.tran: 他吃了很多巧克力冰激凌。

entry.tran: 打破沉默(或僵局);使气氛轻松
entry.def: If you break the ice at a party or meeting, or in a new situation, you say or do something to make people feel relaxed and comfortable.

example.ex: That sort of approach should go a long way toward breaking the ice...
example.tran: 那种方法对打破僵局会大有帮助。

example.ex: The major purpose of his trip was to break the ice, and his itinerary so far has been packed full.
example.tran: 他此行的主要目的是打破僵局，目前的行程已经排满。

entry.tran: 起不到什么作用;没多大影响
entry.def: If you say that something cuts no ice with you, you mean that you are not impressed or influenced by it.

example.ex: That sort of romantic attitude cuts no ice with money-men.
example.tran: 那种不切实际的态度对金融家们根本不起什么作用。

entry.def: If someone puts a plan or project on ice, they delay doing it.

example.ex: The deal was put on ice for three months...
example.tran: 该交易被搁置了 3 个月。

example.ex: The $40 million-a-month aid payments will remain on ice.
example.tran: 每月 4,000 万美元的援助款项将继续搁置下去。

entry.def: If you say that someone is on thin ice or is skating on thin ice, you mean that they are doing something risky which may have serious or unpleasant consequences.

example.ex: I had skated on thin ice and, so far, got away with it.
example.tran: 我曾经冒过很大风险，但目前为止侥幸没事。

sentences.sentence: "look at the ice on that dame!"

sentences.sentence: "the crowd applauded when she skated out onto the ice"

means.word_mean: 2. put ice on or put on ice;

list.explanation: 沉着，镇定的妇女，冷漠的女人

example.zh: 铁娘子玛格丽特·撒切尔

example.en: With their lead, they had the game on ice.
example.zh: 有了领先的位置，那他们就有了赢得比赛的把握

list.explanation: (为备用而)保存着的，暂时搁着的，作好行动准备的

example.en: If this one fails,I've got another on ice.
example.zh: 假如这个不灵，我另外还有一个备用的。

example.en: That's a great idea,but we'll have to put it on ice until we can afford to put it into action.
example.zh: 那主意十分好，不过我们得暂时把它搁置起来，直到可以把它拿出来派上用处为止。

example.en: A couple of days on ice would do you fine.
example.zh: 让你蹲上几天监狱，对你会有好处的。
这部电影真是糟糕透了。

list.explanation: (对某人)没有影响、不起作用，说服不了(某人)，不能使(某人)相信、信服

example.en: I don't care who you are. It cuts no ice with me.
example.zh: 我不管你是谁。这与我无关。

sentences.en: He held a piece of ice and bit off a little.
sentences.cn: 他拿着一块冰, 咬掉了一点。

sentences.en: The car wheels would not bite because of the ice.
sentences.cn: 路上结冰, 汽车轮子打滑。

sentences.en: The hostess iced a bottle of beer.

sentences.cn: 他的拒绝打消了我们的热情。

jushi.english: The ice blocks up the river, making the upstream water unable to flow.
jushi.chinese: 冰把河道堵住了,上游的水流不下来。

jushi.english: The ice is too thin to bear your weight.
jushi.chinese: 冰太薄,承受不了你的体重。
